name: Asteroids_Pwnt
description:
How to Play Asteroids_Pwnt:
Pwn the asteroids before they pwn you! 

  • Arrow keys to steer.
  • Spacebar to shoot.

What is Asteroids_Pwnt:
Asteroids_Pwnt is a high-pace clone of the arcade classic asteroids, built from scratch in Godot with GScript, a scripting language based on Python.

Asteroids_Pwnt is designed to evoke the chaotic feeling of the epic asteroid field scene in Empire Strikes Back. Never tell me the odds!

Acknowledgements:

  • Sprite assets are from the indomitable Kenney.nl: https://kenney.nl/assets/simple-space
  • Background is from Cuzco, altered from the Hubble Telescope: https://opengameart.org/content/space-background
  • See the source code here: https://github.com/LLST-Learning-Games/SpaceBattle_Godot
